cnbc.title: Sellers are taking their homes off the market at the fastest pace in nearly a decade
cnbc.summary: Home sellers are taking their homes off the market at a fast clip, because they are sitting for more than 60 days and prices are weakening.

cnbc.title: Nvidia says its GPUs are a 'generation ahead' of Google's AI chips
cnbc.summary: It was in response to Wall Street's concern that Google's TPU chips could threaten Nvidia's dominance of the AI infrastructure industry on Tuesday.

cnbc.title: HP Inc shares fall on layoffs, weak guidance due to U.S. trade regulations
cnbc.summary: "HP's outlook reflects the added cost driven by the current U.S. trade-related regulations in place, and associated mitigations," the company said.

cnbc.title: FBI seeks to interview Sen. Mark Kelly, other Democrats Trump accused of seditious behavior
cnbc.summary: The Arizona Democrat Sen. Mark Kelly, a U.S. Navy veteran, faces a Pentagon probe for saying in a video, "Our laws are clear: you can refuse illegal orders."

cnbc.title: Workday stock slips on light quarterly margin guidance
cnbc.summary: Workday shares slid more than 5% in extended trading Tuesday after the company issued quarterly margin guidance that came in below Wall Street projections.

cnbc.title: Trump says 'only a few' sticking points remain in Ukraine-Russia peace talks as Kyiv reportedly backs framework
cnbc.summary: Ukraine has reportedly agreed to a potential peace deal with Russia in what could be a massive step toward bringing the devastating four-year war to an end.

cnbc.title: Dell misses on revenue, offers strong forecast driven by AI sales
cnbc.summary: Dell is an important bellwether for the health of the AI infrastructure industry as one of the top vendors for systems based around Nvidia graphics processors.

cnbc.title: A third high-profile tech leader is leaving GM as part of a software-product restructuring
cnbc.summary: GM is combining its vehicle software engineering and global product units under one organization, led by new Chief Product Officer Sterling Anderson.

cnbc.title: Trump pardons Thanksgiving turkeys, blasts Biden and says Ukraine peace deal is ‘very close’
cnbc.summary: Thanksgiving turkey prices have climbed this year, the first of President Donald Trump's second term in the White House.

cnbc.title: Why rural Wisconsin is blocking the AI data center boom: 'Horses are skittish'
cnbc.summary: Tech giants are increasingly facing community backlash as they select places to build mammoth AI data centers.
